extendedInfo.description: Imagine waking up the next day where society is threatened by a disease caused by a deadly virus that is spreading uncontrollably across homes, towns, cities, ... Yes, the human race has survived numerous recorded pandemics in the past: the Black Death of the middle ages, Spanish Flu in the early 20th century.Will we triumph again when the next pandemic comes? Or is this the end? Follow the story of Adam as he experiences the Last Pandemic.This story contains scary surprises and eerie sounds - it is advised that you wear headphones while playing it.The estimated story time for this chapter is around 30-60 minutes.Thanks for downloading The Last Pandemic and we hope that you'll enjoy this story.keywords: pandemic, apocalypse, zombies, adventure, role playing, choose your own adventure, interactive fiction, visual novel
